## 简单探索数据

问卷变量中的类别数、缺失值、均值以及中位数等等

```{r}
library(modelsummary)

df %>%
  select(-id) %>% 
  datasummary_skim(
    type = "numeric",
    histogram = F,
    output = "flextable"
  ) %>%
  flextable::fontsize(size = 8, part = "all") %>% 
  flextable::autofit()
```
